title: Earn dodge button points as you accrue honor
body: I think the game should reward players who conduct themselves well with free dodges. Nothing excessive, just a bonus over time, so if you have to dodge for whatever reason, you can avoid penalty from time to time.

replies.body: now now. you need to think like Riot. make players buy dodge tokens with prestige points or whatever. that way players have to buy dodges.
